title: How to Walk Through Walls in The Pizzeria RP Remastered on ROBLOX

steps.headline: Go into The Pizzeria RP on Roblox.
steps.description: The game over 135 million visits and over 100 thousand likes, so it shouldn't be hard to find. The full name of the game is [DREADBEAR] The Pizzeria RP: Remastered

steps.headline: Go into the Five Nights at Freddy's 2 map.
steps.description: Once your in the game, you will spawn in a lobby with 4 different buildings around you. The Five Nights At Freddy's 2 building has a broken looking bunny (Withered Bonnie) next to the door, and a paper bunny that looks like it was made by children on the other side of the door (Paper Pal). Go through that door.

steps.headline: Choose Withered Fredbear.
steps.description: After going through the door, you will be taken to a screen with 3 options. Animatronic, Human, and OC. Click “Animatronic,” and choose “Withered Fredbear.” He's a yellow bear, wears a black top hat and bowtie, and he is missing an ear.

steps.headline: Go to the office.
steps.description: Once you choose Withered Fredbear, go to the office. You might notice you have the ability to teleport to the office. You can use it, but it has to recharge and you'll need it later, meaning you'll have to wait, so it's better to walk. The office looks like a small room, with 2 vents on opposite sides, and it has a table in the middle of it with no chairs. People come here to attack guards, because thats where the guards work. They're just roleplaying, though!

steps.headline: Go outside.
steps.description: At the back wall of the office, there is a door leading to outdoors. Go through it.

steps.headline: Teleport back in the office.
steps.description: At the bottom of your screen, you should see a yellowish button that says “Teleport to the Office.” Click it.

steps.headline: You can now walk through walls.
steps.description: You should see nothing around you. So when you're walking, it looks like normal walking! But for others, everything is the same, they see a pizzeria! So when you're walking, you might be walking through a wall... or anything!

steps.headline: Go into The Pizzeria RP and the Five Nights At Freddy's 2 map.
steps.description: Both wall glitches only work here.

steps.headline: Pick a character.
steps.description: Unlike the other wall glitch, in this one, you can be any character! You can be a animatronic, or a human, or an OC. But, theres a twist... Any character that does not have the ability to crawl will not be able to walk through walls.

steps.headline: Go to the office and outside.
Go behind a pole.
steps.description: There will be 3 poles next to the building, and you're able to go behind them.

steps.headline: Crawl while behind a pole.
steps.description: Your legs might get stuck in the wall behind you. That is exactly what you want.

steps.headline: Go up while your legs are in a wall.
steps.description: Do not go in first person. Pretend you're just trying to walk forward. Once you do that, your character should be looking up.

steps.headline: Go in first person.
steps.description: Go in first person while facing the wall; facing anywhere else will make you start the glitch again. You know it worked if your head is in the wall from the inside, and your characters body is not.

steps.headline: Go in first person and keep jumping.
steps.description: This time, go in first person looking away from the wall. Then, keep jumping. Sometimes, the first time you jump you will go inside the building, and other times you have to keep jumping.

steps.headline: You're in!
steps.description: After you done all of that correctly, you should be in the same situation as the last method, seeing an empty building while everyone else sees a pizzeria.

text: Using Withered FredBear (Easier Method) Go into The Pizzeria RP on Roblox. The game over 135 million visits and over 100 thousand likes, so it shouldn't be hard to find. The full name of the game is [DREADBEAR] The Pizzeria RP: Remastered Go into the Five Nights at Freddy's 2 map. Once your in the game, you will spawn in a lobby with 4 different buildings around you. The Five Nights At Freddy's 2 building has a broken looking bunny (Withered Bonnie) next to the door, and a paper bunny that looks like it was made by children on the other side of the door (Paper Pal). Go through that door. Choose Withered Fredbear. After going through the door, you will be taken to a screen with 3 options. Animatronic, Human, and OC. Click “Animatronic,” and choose “Withered Fredbear.” He's a yellow bear, wears a black top hat and bowtie, and he is missing an ear. Go to the office. Once you choose Withered Fredbear, go to the office. You might notice you have the ability to teleport to the office. You can use it, but it has to recharge and you'll need it later, meaning you'll have to wait, so it's better to walk. The office looks like a small room, with 2 vents on opposite sides, and it has a table in the middle of it with no chairs. People come here to attack guards, because thats where the guards work. They're just roleplaying, though! Go outside. At the back wall of the office, there is a door leading to outdoors. Go through it. Teleport back in the office. At the bottom of your screen, you should see a yellowish button that says “Teleport to the Office.” Click it. You can now walk through walls. You should see nothing around you. So when you're walking, it looks like normal walking! But for others, everything is the same, they see a pizzeria! So when you're walking, you might be walking through a wall... or anything! Using Other Characters (Harder Method) Go into The Pizzeria RP and the Five Nights At Freddy's 2 map. Both wall glitches only work here. Pick a character. Unlike the other wall glitch, in this one, you can be any character! You can be a animatronic, or a human, or an OC. But, theres a twist... Any character that does not have the ability to crawl will not be able to walk through walls. Go to the office and outside.  Go behind a pole. There will be 3 poles next to the building, and you're able to go behind them. Crawl while behind a pole. Your legs might get stuck in the wall behind you. That is exactly what you want. Go up while your legs are in a wall. Do not go in first person. Pretend you're just trying to walk forward. Once you do that, your character should be looking up. Go in first person. Go in first person while facing the wall; facing anywhere else will make you start the glitch again. You know it worked if your head is in the wall from the inside, and your characters body is not. Go in first person and keep jumping. This time, go in first person looking away from the wall. Then, keep jumping. Sometimes, the first time you jump you will go inside the building, and other times you have to keep jumping. You're in! After you done all of that correctly, you should be in the same situation as the last method, seeing an empty building while everyone else sees a pizzeria.
